metadata.name: RECHARGED
metadata.description:
In the middle of a peaceful silence, a sudden explosion shakes off the buildings of a sleeping city.

The warning siren was screaming in the hallways of BlackBox headquarters when a confident steps broke through all the chaos to reach the security door.

As taking orders from the intel radio, she approaches her energy fueled motorcycle and pull the charging plug off.

The engine is pumping like it's the last mission, the power meters all set to the maximum, and as the shelter door is rising, an overwhelming blast of energy breaks through the havoc smoke embodied in the shape of a fighter wearing a red suit flying on her bike, and ready to fulfill her mission.


- Artwork made by: XENOTRIP
- JPEG: 4000x5000 px

- All bidders will receive "BlackBox" token.
- Top 3 bidders will receive "BlackBox" promo stamp.
